description.compact: Converts to and from JSON format.

param.description: object behavior flags; combine with boolean-OR

docblock.param: possible values: - SERVICES_JSON_LOOSE_TYPE: loose typing. "{...}" syntax creates associative arrays instead of objects in decode(). - SERVICES_JSON_SUPPRESS_ERRORS: error suppression. Values which can't be encoded (e.g. resources) appear as NULL instead of throwing errors. By default, a deeply-nested resource will bubble up with an error, so all return values from encode() should be checked with isError()
